Review_Text: True and unbiased picture of agitation. Good work.

Review_title: Good movie focused on exposing fake news and its impact on society brotherhood
Review_Text:
Movie exposes fake and paid media ,how misreporting and unsocial elements destroy society brotherhood.
Role of govt. agencies in spreading hate and violance .
Movie also highlights the suffering of the family members who lost their love ones and gives a message that violance not spare anyone , suffering are not limited to one caste it destroys whole society.
Totally unbiased movie shows only truth need to make it more nice

Review_title: Perfect movie amazing direction and unbiased content
Review_Text: Loved cheer haran movie and totally the direction and quality of every scene and detailing of each incident. I'd like to see this movie up again for theatres. The Jat agitation incident was unlike cause which was politically driven and agitated. Love u haryana.

We all need these kind of documentaries..which based on truth without any biaseness. It is short but I can say that it provide us most of the things in a short period of time. It gives you a better perspective about humanity and culture. Don't forget to watch this.
